items.preText: 4.15pm Welcome back. Nasir will open the bowling with his fast offbreaks. One slip in place. Kusal to take strike first. Tharanga at the other end. Nasir will operate around the wicket. In the first match, Shakib and Sunzamul had opened the bowling Mishan: "Shakib passed over the 10,000 international runs this match! Another Milestone for him! Congrats Mr.Allrounder!"
items.text: pushed through on middle stump, arm ball, takes the inside edge and wanders away through midwicket
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to MDKJ Perera, 1 run

items.text: fizzes in from outside off and holds its line, the batsman searches for turn and is beaten on the outside edge
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full on off, pushed up to the covers
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: back of a length and outside off, punched to the covers
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: drifts in on off, tapped to mid-on for a speedy single
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: round-arm dart on the stumps, forward and pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.preText: Pace from the other end: captain Mashrafe Mortaza
items.text: back of a length and slanting away just a shade outside off, punched up to backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: Mashrafe wins an lbw appeal from umpire Rahman. Tharanga calls for a review. Attempted short ball, but shoots really low, and hits the flap of the back pad as Tharanga pulls and does not make any contact with the bat. He was undone by the lack of bounce. The ball could have pitched outside leg. Just outside leg it is, and Rahman has to overturn another decision. He hasn't had a good day
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: this one skirts past the outside edge. Good length and bounces outside off, nearly shaves the outside edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: pitched up and outside off, gently knocked to mid-off running in. Kusal wants a single, Tharanga takes a few steps down, but he sends back Kusal. He undoes his steps in time
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: good length and jumps past the outside edge as Tharanga chases after this
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: slow, short cutter outside off, Tharanga flashes at it and under-edges it, the nick does not carry through to Mushfiq. Mashrafe begins with a maiden
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: Mashrafe gives Nasir another over, and he rewards his captain with the wicket of Kusal. This is a poor shot to be honest. Straight ball on middle from around the wicket, the batsman jumps down the track, gets too close to the pitch, and has a big whoosh at it. Kusal only collects thin air while Nasir rattles the middle stump and celebrates
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to MDKJ Perera, OUT

dismissal.text: MDKJ Perera  b Nasir Hossain 1 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33

items.text: turning offbreak on off, pushed with the break to long-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: on a length and outside off, presses forward and drives straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: Tharanga dashes down the track and drills it straight back to the left of the bowler. Nasir throws himself to his left and deflects the ball to mid-on
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: dropped short and wide outside off - Tharanga loves it there - he leans back and cracks it fine of backward point
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.preText: Hossen: "what could be better gift than a wicket in his second over from an irregular bowler for a captain introducing very first?"
items.text: Tharanga steps out, meets the pitch, and hacks it right back to Nasir
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: slightly back of a length and outside off, punched through the line to mid-off
items.postText: Sachith: "This must be the last chance for Mendis. He got too many opportunities and wasted all most all. "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: full and shoots low on leg stump, Mashrafe lands it on the seam. Mendis goes low with it and pokes to short midwicket. First runs off Mashrafe after eight balls
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: full and angling across off stump, Tharanga has a crease-bound waft... and misses
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: Masud: "I've always considered Nasir Hossain to be a criminally underrated limited over bowler. He's the kind of bowler who'll give you 10 overs for sub 50, field brilliantly. Shame he hasn't been picked up by T20 teams around the world"
items.text: short, wide, slashed to deep point. And Mashrafe has overstepped
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, (no ball) 1 run

items.text: full and sprayed into the pads, Kusal slogs so hard that he loses his shape and deflects it off the thigh to fine leg. Mushfiq himself chases the ball, as does Tamim, and other fielder. They save two for their side
items.postText: Zuhayer Ahmed: "Nasir... a batting all rounder converted to a bowling all rounder.... good for him to retain a place in the team..."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, 2 leg byes

items.text: shuffles across and whips to midwicket, where the fielder lets the ball burst through his hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: driven delightfully between the bowler and the non-striker. Slightly overpitched and outside off, Tharanga moves forward and eases it straight down the ground
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, FOUR runs
